column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As agonizing as it is
column2: the food is always worth it! We ordered a large Malnati Classic deep dish (sausage and tomato sauce on their Buttercrust)
column3: a medium thin crust pizza with mushrooms
column9: and gorgonzola cheese with vinaigrette and romano cheese) for our group of five. There was plenty to go around with a few slices of each pizza leftover.
